title: I'm here for an argument
description:
When people make a request or proposal I often see them present their request and arguments using the following structure:
 Make a request Give a plethora of arguments why that request is a good idea.  An example:
 I want to go to the zoo! Because I want to see animal Because I want to spend time with you Because it has been a long time  Here I think, meh, the zoo.
